Instruction: Cook ziti pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, and pepper. Stir until well combined.
In a large skillet, brown Italian sausage over medium heat. Remove sausage from skillet and crumble. Drain excess grease.
Saut√© onion and garlic in the same skillet until softened. Add crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, and Italian sausage. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Combine cooked ziti, cheese mixture, and tomato sauce mixture in a large baking dish. Stir to combine.
Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until bubbly and golden brown.
